description: Try our easy to follow Mango & Lime Mousse recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mango & Lime Mousse Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 large ripe mangoes (plus extra to garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Add gelatine to 1/4 cup boiling water and whisk with a fork until dissolved. Set aside to cool.
Cut cheeks from either side of the mango stones and scoop flesh from skin with a large spoon. Roughly chop and place into a food processor. Add sugar and lime rind and juice. Process until smooth.
With blender running, add cooled gelatine and process for 30 seconds. Gently fold in cream and spoon into glasses or bowls. Chill until set.
You may like to top with some extra mango and serve with sponge fingers.
